summary: Build ComplianceEdge Pro: a role-based internal compliance data management & SEBI/NSE/BSE report generation SaaS dashboard for stock broker staff, optimized for high data density and audit readiness; proceed explicitly without any email features.
architectural_notes: Email features explicitly excluded (welcome/margin-call/statement emails, email templates, scheduled email reminders, bulk email workflows).
Design system target: Salesforce Lightning Design System + Zerodha Console; fonts Inter + JetBrains Mono; keyboard-first UX.
Primary workflow goal: input data once and generate 40+ regulatory reports with zero manual formatting; multi-format export (PDF/Excel/XML).
Provide user-downloadable sample/template files for each import/upload workflow (CSV + Excel) and surface them contextually in the UI.
Include an in-app, reader-friendly "How to use" guide accessible from the main dashboard.

existing_features.title: Implement Internet Identity sign-in and an application-level user system with roles: Super Admin, Compliance Head/Officer, Accountant, Operations Manager, Dealer (read-only), and External Auditor.

Define a granular permissions model (capabilities) and enforce it throughout the app for module access and actions (view/create/edit/approve/export) per role, including read-only restrictions for Dealer and scoped visibility for External Auditor.

Create a high-density, audit-ready dashboard shell (navigation, page layout, filters) and an Overview landing page that includes: compliance health score, pending actions, trade stats, margin status summary, regulatory calendar widget, alerts, and quick actions.

Build the Data Entry module including a Trade Import wizard that supports: file import and manual entry (and optional API import placeholders), column mapping, validation, categorization, and post-import actions (review, commit, rollback).
Implement Client Management (UCC master) with create/edit UI (modal), required KYC fields, validations (including PAN format), and document upload/storage with bulk upload support.
Implement Margin & Collateral module: peak margin snapshots, margin call workflow (in-app only), pledged securities tracking, and daily collateral reporting views.
Implement Bank Reconciliation module: statement upload, auto-matching engine, unmatched-items review workflow, and reconciliation reporting.

Create a Report Library and a universal Report Generation wizard that supports templates, smart validations, audit metadata (who/when/parameters), and export to PDF/Excel/XML/JSON, with no email delivery.

Add a Scheduled/Automated report generation hub with configurable run times and in-app failure alerts; include optional auto-submit only where an integration is explicitly configured, and do not implement email/WhatsApp delivery.
Implement Compliance Monitoring: an interactive regulatory calendar with reminders (in-app), status tracking, assignment to users/roles, and filtering by date/status/assignee.

Implement Surveillance Alerts module with rule-based alert records (e.g., wash trading, front running, AML), investigation workflow (triage, assign, evidence/notes, resolution), and an evidence viewer.

Implement an immutable Audit Trail: log all create/update/delete and workflow transitions with before/after snapshots, filtering and drill-down UI, and export; include an optional verification-ready archive mechanism but keep it within the single-backend-canister constraint.
Create Configuration modules for: exchange settings, user management, and API integrations (exchanges, KRA, depositories, accounting), explicitly excluding any email template/configuration features.

Apply a coherent, distinct visual theme for a high-density, professional compliance dashboard (typography, spacing, color system, table styles, forms, status badges) and enforce it consistently across all pages; do not use blue/purple as the primary palette.
Add generated static image assets and wire them into the frontend (store under frontend/public/assets/generated) for branding and dashboard polish.
Add the provided sample template files as static frontend assets so they can be downloaded directly by users.
Expose “Download sample file” links/buttons in each relevant module screen so users can easily download the correct template format from the place where data is uploaded/entered.
Create a complete, reader-friendly “How to use this platform” guide and make it accessible from the dashboard (Overview) in a prominent, easy-to-read format.
